trans-unit.source: Represents a Windows text box control.
trans-unit.target: 表示 Windows 文字方塊控制項。

trans-unit.source: With the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control, the user can enter text in an application.
trans-unit.target: 與<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控制項，使用者也可以在應用程式中輸入文字。

trans-unit.source: This control has additional functionality that is not found in the standard Windows text box control, including multiline editing and password character masking.
trans-unit.target: 這個控制項具有標準 Windows 文字方塊控制項，包括多行編輯與密碼字元遮罩中找不到的其他功能。

trans-unit.source: Typically, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control is used to display, or accept as input, a single line of text.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控制項用來顯示，或接受做為輸入，單行文字。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Multiline%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.ScrollBars%2A> properties to enable multiple lines of text to be displayed or entered.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Multiline%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.ScrollBars%2A>屬性，以啟用多行顯示，或輸入的文字。

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.AcceptsTab%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AcceptsReturn%2A> properties to `true` to enable greater text manipulation in a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.AcceptsTab%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AcceptsReturn%2A>屬性`true`啟用更多行中的文字操作<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控制項。

trans-unit.source: You must set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Multiline%2A> property to `true` to adjust the height of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 您必須設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Multiline%2A>屬性`true`調整的高度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控制項。

trans-unit.source: You can adjust the height by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定來調整高度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can limit the amount of text entered into a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.MaxLength%2A> property to a specific number of characters.
trans-unit.target: 您可以限制輸入的文字數量<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>藉由設定控制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.MaxLength%2A>屬性設為特定數目的字元。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controls can also be used to accept passwords and other sensitive information.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> 控制項也可用來接受密碼和其他機密資訊。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.PasswordChar%2A> property to mask characters entered in a single-line version of the control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.PasswordChar%2A>遮罩字元版本的控制項會單行中輸入的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.CharacterCasing%2A> property to enable the user to type only uppercase, only lowercase, or a combination of uppercase and lowercase characters into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.CharacterCasing%2A>屬性，讓使用者只輸入大寫、 僅小寫或大寫和小寫字元的組合<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控制項。

trans-unit.source: To scroll the contents of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> until the cursor (caret) is within the visible region of the control, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ScrollToCaret%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 視窗的內容捲動<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>內控制項的可見區域資料指標 （插入號） 之前，您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ScrollToCaret%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To select a range of text in the text box, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Select%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要選取文字範圍的文字方塊中，您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Select%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To restrict text from being entered in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control, you can create an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> event in order to validate each character entered in the control.
trans-unit.target: 若要限制從輸入中的文字<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控制項時，您可以建立事件處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>事件，以驗證輸入控制項中的每個字元。

trans-unit.source: You can also restrict all entry of data in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以限制資料中的所有項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>藉由設定控制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A>屬性`true`。

trans-unit.source: Most of the functionality of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control is inherited from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase> class.
trans-unit.target: 大部分的功能<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控制項都繼承自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase>類別。

trans-unit.source: Using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control with visual styles enabled will cause the incorrect handling of surrogate fonts.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控制項啟用視覺化樣式會導致不正確處理 surrogate 字型。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control with vertical scroll bars.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>具有垂直捲軸控制項。

trans-unit.source: This example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.AcceptsTab%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AcceptsReturn%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> properties to make the multiline text box control useful for creating text documents.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.AcceptsTab%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AcceptsReturn%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A>屬性，使多行文字方塊控制項適用於建立文字文件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The parent container control defines the color and font settings for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 父容器控制項定義的色彩和字型設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a new instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control and assigns a string to the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Text%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立的新執行個體<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控制，並將字串指派給控制項的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Text%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether pressing ENTER in a multiline <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox" /> control creates a new line of text in the control or activates the default button for the form.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出在多行 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox" /> 控制項中按 ENTER 時，是否會在控制項中建立新行文字或啟動表單的預設按鈕。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the ENTER key creates a new line of text in a multiline version of the control; <see langword="false" /> if the ENTER key activates the default button for the form.
trans-unit.target: 如果 ENTER 鍵在控制項的多行版本中建立新的文字行，則為 <see langword="true" />，如果 ENTER 鍵啟動表單的預設按鈕，則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If the value of this property is `false`, the user must press CTRL+ENTER to create a new line in a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性的值為`false`，使用者必須按 CTRL + ENTER 在多行中建立新的一行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控制項。

trans-unit.source: If there is no default button for the form, the ENTER key will always create a new line of text in the control, regardless of the value of this property.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有任何表單的預設按鈕，ENTER 鍵一律會建立新的一行文字在控制項中，不論這個屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control with vertical scroll bars.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>具有垂直捲軸控制項。

trans-unit.source: This example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.AcceptsTab%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AcceptsReturn%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.WordWrap%2A> properties to make the multiline text box control useful for creating text documents.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.AcceptsTab%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AcceptsReturn%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.WordWrap%2A>屬性，使多行文字方塊控制項適用於建立文字文件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a custom <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection" /> to use when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource" /> property is set to <see langword="CustomSource" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定當 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource" /> 屬性設定為 <see langword="CustomSource" /> 時所使用的自訂 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection" /> to use with <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource" />.
trans-unit.target: 要搭配 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource" /> 使用的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> properties to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> that automatically completes input strings by comparing the prefix being entered to the prefixes of all strings in a maintained source.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A>屬性來建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>自動完成輸入的字串比較輸入中維護的來源的所有字串的前置詞的前置詞。

trans-unit.source: This is useful for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controls in which URLs, addresses, file names, or commands will be frequently entered.
trans-unit.target: 這適用於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>所在 Url、 地址、 檔案名稱或命令會經常輸入的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The use of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A> property is optional, but you must set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> property to `CustomSource` in order to use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>屬性是選擇性的但是您必須設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A>屬性`CustomSource`才能使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>。

trans-unit.source: You must use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> properties together.
trans-unit.target: 您必須使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A>屬性放在一起。

trans-unit.source: The operating system might limit the number of custom strings that it can display at once.
trans-unit.target: 作業系統可能會限制可同時顯示的自訂字串數目。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use a collection as the auto-complete custom source for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用集合做為，自動完成的自訂來源<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This example does the following:
trans-unit.target: 此範例會執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> property to enable the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control to accept a custom source for its auto-complete behavior.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A>屬性來啟用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控制項來接受自動完成行為的自訂來源。

trans-unit.source: Uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A> property to set the custom list of values.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>屬性來設定自訂值的清單。

trans-unit.source: Uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A> property to set how the auto-complete candidates are displayed.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A>屬性來設定自動完成的候選項目顯示的方式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an option that controls how automatic completion works for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定選項，控制如何在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox" /> 中使用自動完成。

trans-unit.source: One of the values of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteMode" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteMode" /> 的其中一個值。

trans-unit.source: The following are the values.
trans-unit.target: 值如下。

trans-unit.source: Appends the remainder of the most likely candidate string to the existing characters, highlighting the appended characters.
trans-unit.target: 將最可能的候選字串其餘部分附加至現有字元，並反白顯示附加的字元。

trans-unit.source: Displays the auxiliary drop-down list associated with the edit control.
trans-unit.target: 顯示與編輯控制項相關的輔助下拉式清單。

trans-unit.source: This drop-down is populated with one or more suggested completion strings.
trans-unit.target: 一或多個建議完成字串會填入這個下拉式清單。

trans-unit.source: Appends both <see langword="Suggest" /> and <see langword="Append" /> options.
trans-unit.target: 附加 <see langword="Suggest" /> 和 <see langword="Append" /> 選項。

trans-unit.source: Disables automatic completion.
trans-unit.target: 停用自動完成

trans-unit.source: This is the default.
trans-unit.target: 這是預設值。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> properties to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> that automatically completes input strings by comparing the prefix being entered to the prefixes of all strings in a maintained source.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A>屬性來建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>自動完成輸入的字串比較輸入中維護的來源的所有字串的前置詞的前置詞。

trans-unit.source: This is useful for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controls in which URLs, addresses, file names, or commands will be frequently entered.
trans-unit.target: 這適用於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>所在 Url、 地址、 檔案名稱或命令會經常輸入的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The use of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A> property is optional, but you must set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> property to `CustomSource` in order to use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>屬性是選擇性的但是您必須設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A>屬性`CustomSource`才能使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>。

trans-unit.source: You must use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> properties together.
trans-unit.target: 您必須使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A>屬性放在一起。

trans-unit.source: The operating system might limit the number of custom strings that it can display at once.
trans-unit.target: 作業系統可能會限制可同時顯示的自訂字串數目。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use a collection as the auto-complete custom source for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用集合做為，自動完成的自訂來源<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This example does the following:
trans-unit.target: 此範例會執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> property to enable the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control to accept a custom source for its auto-complete behavior.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A>屬性來啟用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控制項來接受自動完成行為的自訂來源。

trans-unit.source: Uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A> property to set the custom list of values.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>屬性來設定自訂值的清單。

trans-unit.source: Uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A> property to set how the auto-complete candidates are displayed.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A>屬性來設定自動完成的候選項目顯示的方式。

trans-unit.source: The specified value is not one of the values of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteMode" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定值不是 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteMode" /> 的其中一個值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value specifying the source of complete strings used for automatic completion.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，以指定用於自動完成的完整字串來源。

trans-unit.source: One of the values of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteSource" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteSource" /> 的其中一個值。

trans-unit.source: The options are <see langword="AllSystemSources" />, <see langword="AllUrl" />, <see langword="FileSystem" />, <see langword="HistoryList" />, <see langword="RecentlyUsedList" />, <see langword="CustomSource" />, and <see langword="None" />.
trans-unit.target: 這些選項包括 <see langword="AllSystemSources" />、<see langword="AllUrl" />、<see langword="FileSystem" />、<see langword="HistoryList" />、<see langword="RecentlyUsedList" />、<see langword="CustomSource" /> 和 <see langword="None" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="None" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="None" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> properties to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> that automatically completes input strings by comparing the prefix being entered to the prefixes of all strings in a maintained source.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A>屬性來建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>自動完成輸入的字串比較輸入中維護的來源的所有字串的前置詞的前置詞。

trans-unit.source: This is useful for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controls in which URLs, addresses, file names, or commands will be frequently entered.
trans-unit.target: 這適用於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>所在 Url、 地址、 檔案名稱或命令會經常輸入的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The use of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A> property is optional, but you must set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> property to `CustomSource` in order to use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>屬性是選擇性的但是您必須設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A>屬性`CustomSource`才能使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>。

trans-unit.source: You must use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> properties together.
trans-unit.target: 您必須使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A>屬性放在一起。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> does not work on multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> 在多行上無法運作<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The operating system might limit the number of custom strings that can be displayed at once.
trans-unit.target: 作業系統可能會限制可以同時顯示的自訂字串數目。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use a collection as the auto-complete custom source for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用集合做為，自動完成的自訂來源<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This example does the following:
trans-unit.target: 此範例會執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> property to enable the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control to accept a custom source for its auto-complete behavior.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A>屬性來啟用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控制項來接受自動完成行為的自訂來源。

trans-unit.source: Uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A> property to set the custom list of values.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>屬性來設定自訂值的清單。

trans-unit.source: Uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A> property to set how the auto-complete candidates are displayed.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A>屬性來設定自動完成的候選項目顯示的方式。

trans-unit.source: The specified value is not one of the values of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteSource" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定值不是 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteSource" /> 的其中一個值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox" /> control modifies the case of characters as they are typed.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox" /> 控制項是否在輸入字元時修改字元的大小寫。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CharacterCasing" /> enumeration values that specifies whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox" /> control modifies the case of characters.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CharacterCasing" /> 列舉值，指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox" /> 控制項是否修改字元的大小寫。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="CharacterCasing.Normal" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="CharacterCasing.Normal" />。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.CharacterCasing%2A> property to change the case of characters as required by your application.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.CharacterCasing%2A>屬性來變更所需的應用程式的字元的大小寫。

trans-unit.source: For example, you could change the case of all characters entered in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control used for password entry to uppercase or lowercase to enforce a policy for passwords.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以變更的所有輸入的字元大小寫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>密碼項目為大寫或小寫來強制執行密碼原則所用的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control that is used to accept a password.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>用來接受密碼的控制項。

trans-unit.source: This example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.CharacterCasing%2A> property to change all characters typed to lowercase, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.MaxLength%2A> property to restrict the password length to eight characters.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.CharacterCasing%2A>屬性來變更類型的所有字元大小寫，而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.MaxLength%2A>屬性，以將密碼長度限制為 8 個字元。

trans-unit.source: This example also uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.TextAlign%2A> property to center the password in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 此範例也會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.TextAlign%2A>屬性中心中的密碼<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控制項。

trans-unit.source: A value that is not within the range of valid values for the enumeration was assigned to the property.
trans-unit.target: 不在列舉型別 (Enumeration) 有效值範圍內的值會指派給這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the required creation parameters when the control handle is created.
trans-unit.target: 建立控制代碼時，取得必要的建立參數。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams" /> that contains the required creation parameters when the handle to the control is created.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams" />，包含建立控制項之控制代碼時所需的建立參數。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源，<see langword="false" /> 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 釋放 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox" /> 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: `Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> 叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> references.
trans-unit.target: `disposing` 參數為 `true` 時，這個方法會釋放 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> 參考的任何 Managed 物件所掌握的資源。

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose` 方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Dispose" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Dispose" /> 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed in an earlier call to <see langword="Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />，請小心不要參考到先前處置之前呼叫中的物件<see langword="Dispose" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何實作<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />，請參閱[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see langword="Dispose" /> and <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關<see langword="Dispose" />和<see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[覆寫 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

trans-unit.source: One of the key's values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個按鍵的值。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified key is an input key or a special key that requires preprocessing.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的按鍵是輸入按鍵還是需要前置處理的特殊按鍵。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified key is an input key; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的按鍵是輸入按鍵，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.IsInputKey%2A> method returns `true` when `keyData` includes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys.Return> value and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AcceptsReturn%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.IsInputKey%2A>方法會傳回`true`時`keyData`包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys.Return>值和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AcceptsReturn%2A>屬性是`true`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this is a multiline <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出這是否為多行 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox" /> 控制項。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control is a multiline <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox" /> control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此控制項為多行 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox" /> 控制項，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> does not work on multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> 在多行上無法運作<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控制項。

trans-unit.source: When the font is changed, any indentation that you have defined does not appear.
trans-unit.target: 變更字型時，未顯示您已定義任何縮排。

trans-unit.source: To get indentation, set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.Multiline%2A> to `true` and override WM_SETFONT without calling the base class so that SETMARGINS is not called.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得縮排，設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.Multiline%2A>至`true`並覆寫 WM_SETFONT，而不需要呼叫基底類別，以便 SETMARGINS 則不會呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control with vertical scroll bars.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>具有垂直捲軸控制項。

trans-unit.source: This example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.AcceptsTab%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AcceptsReturn%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.WordWrap%2A> properties to make the multiline text box control useful for creating text documents.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.AcceptsTab%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AcceptsReturn%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.WordWrap%2A>屬性，使多行文字方塊控制項適用於建立文字文件。

trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColorChanged" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.OnBackColorChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.OnBackColorChanged%2A> 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.OnBackColorChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.OnBackColorChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.OnBackColorChanged(System.EventArgs)" />在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.OnBackColorChanged(System.EventArgs)" />方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: When the user selects text in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control, the control saves the selection.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者選取的文字<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控制項，控制項儲存選取項目。

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control gets focus, the selection is the same as when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> loses focus.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控制項取得焦點，選取項目時相同<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>失去焦點。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> gets focus for the first time, the entire text is selected.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>取得焦點放在第一次，、 選取整個文字。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the character used to mask characters of a password in a single-line <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定在單行 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox" /> 控制項中用來遮罩密碼字元的字元。

trans-unit.source: The character used to mask characters entered in a single-line <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 用來遮罩在單行 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox" /> 控制項中已輸入字元的字元。

trans-unit.source: Set the value of this property to 0 (character value) if you do not want the control to mask characters as they are typed.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不想要控制項在輸入字元時遮罩它們，請設定這個屬性值為 0 (字元值)。

trans-unit.source: Equals 0 (character value) by default.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 0 (字元值)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.UseSystemPasswordChar%2A> property has precedence over the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.PasswordChar%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.UseSystemPasswordChar%2A>屬性的優先順序高於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.PasswordChar%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Whenever the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.UseSystemPasswordChar%2A> is set to `true`, the default system password character is used and any character set by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.PasswordChar%2A> is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 每當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.UseSystemPasswordChar%2A>設`true`、 使用預設系統密碼字元，以及所設定的任何字元<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.PasswordChar%2A>會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.PasswordChar%2A> property is set, cut and copy actions in the control using the keyboard cannot be performed.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.PasswordChar%2A>屬性設定，使用鍵盤在控制項中的剪下和複製動作無法執行。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> is in password mode because <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.PasswordChar%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.UseSystemPasswordChar%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A> is `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> is in restricted mode.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>是密碼模式中，因為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.PasswordChar%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.UseSystemPasswordChar%2A>，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A>是`true`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>為限制模式。

trans-unit.source: In this mode, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode> is disabled, but the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode> is cached so that it can be restored if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> ever becomes unrestricted.
trans-unit.target: 在此模式中，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode>已停用，但目前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode>快取，因此它可以還原如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>萬一不受限制。

trans-unit.source: Toggling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A> is a common scenario.
trans-unit.target: 切換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A>是常見的案例。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode> is shadowed while the control is in restricted mode.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode>控制項在受限制的模式時，會加上陰影。

trans-unit.source: From the designer perspective, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode> value shown is the actual value.
trans-unit.target: 從設計工具的觀點來看，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode>值顯示為實際值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control that is used to accept a password.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>用來接受密碼的控制項。

trans-unit.source: This example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.CharacterCasing%2A> property to change all characters typed to lowercase and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.MaxLength%2A> property to restrict the password length to eight characters.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.CharacterCasing%2A>若要變更所有字元的屬性型別為小寫字母和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.MaxLength%2A>屬性，以將密碼長度限制為 8 個字元。

trans-unit.source: This example also uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.TextAlign%2A> property to center the password in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 此範例也會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.TextAlign%2A>屬性中心中的密碼<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The text to replace.
trans-unit.target: 要取代的文字。

trans-unit.source: Sets the selected text to the specified text without clearing the undo buffer.
trans-unit.target: 將所選文字設為所指定的文字，而不清除復原緩衝區。

trans-unit.source: Unlike setting <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.SelectedText%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.Paste%2A> does not affect the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 不同於設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.SelectedText%2A>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.Paste%2A>不會影響剪貼簿。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" />, passed by reference that represents the window message to process.
trans-unit.target: 傳址方式所傳遞的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" />，表示要處理的視窗訊息。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> values that represents the shortcut key to process.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> 值，表示要處理的快速鍵。

trans-unit.source: Processes a command key.
trans-unit.target: 處理命令按鍵。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the command key was processed by the control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果命令鍵已由控制項處理則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: New in 4.6.1.

In previous versions, the Ctrl-A shortcut key in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> failed to select all text when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ShortcutsEnabled%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.Multiline%2A> properties were both set to `true.`.
trans-unit.target: 在舊版中的 Ctrl A 快速鍵<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>無法選取所有文字時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ShortcutsEnabled%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.Multiline%2A>屬性已設為同時`true.`。

trans-unit.source: This method enables the Ctrl-A shortcut key to select all text when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ShortcutsEnabled%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.Multiline%2A> properties are both set to `true.`
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可讓 CTRL-A 攠摝坫選取所有文字時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ShortcutsEnabled%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.Multiline%2A>屬性都設定為 `true.`

trans-unit.source: Applications targeting .NET Framework versions 4.0 through 4.6 can take advantage of this method by adding the following to the `<runtime>` section of the app.config file:
trans-unit.target: 以.NET Framework 版本 4.0 到 4.6 為目標的應用程式可以利用此方法加入至下列`<runtime>`app.config 檔的區段：

trans-unit.source: Applications targeting .NET Framework versions 4.6.1 or newer can opt out of this behavior by adding the following to the `<runtime>` section of the app.config file:
trans-unit.target: 應用程式的目標為.NET framework 4.6.1 或更新版本可以藉由新增下列命令以取消這個行為`<runtime>`app.config 檔的區段：

trans-unit.source: If the app.config file already contains an `AppContextSwitchOverrides` key, merge the new key value into the existing key.
trans-unit.target: 如果 app.config 檔已經包含`AppContextSwitchOverrides`機碼、 新的金鑰值合併至現有的索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: For example, `<AppContextSwitchOverrides value = "oldKey=oldValue;Switch.System.Windows.Forms.DoNotSupportSelectAllShortcutInMultilineTextBox=false" />`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，`<AppContextSwitchOverrides value = "oldKey=oldValue;Switch.System.Windows.Forms.DoNotSupportSelectAllShortcutInMultilineTextBox=false" />`。

trans-unit.source: for operating with unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 用於與 unmanaged 程式碼的作業。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets which scroll bars should appear in a multiline <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定在多行 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox" /> 控制項中應該顯示的捲軸。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBars" /> enumeration values that indicates whether a multiline <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox" /> control appears with no scroll bars, a horizontal scroll bar, a vertical scroll bar, or both.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBars" /> 列舉值，指出多行 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox" /> 控制項是顯示為沒有捲軸、有水平捲軸、有垂直捲軸，還是兩者都有。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="ScrollBars.None" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="ScrollBars.None" />。

trans-unit.source: Horizontal scroll bars will not be shown if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.WordWrap%2A> property is set to `true`, regardless of the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.ScrollBars%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 水平捲軸不會顯示如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.WordWrap%2A>屬性設定為`true`，不論值的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.ScrollBars%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control with vertical scroll bars.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>具有垂直捲軸控制項。

trans-unit.source: This example also uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.AcceptsTab%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AcceptsReturn%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.WordWrap%2A> properties to make the multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control useful for creating text documents.
trans-unit.target: 此範例也會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.AcceptsTab%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AcceptsReturn%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.WordWrap%2A>屬性，使多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>適用於建立文字文件的控制項。

trans-unit.source: A value that is not within the range of valid values for the enumeration was assigned to the property.
trans-unit.target: 不在列舉型別 (Enumeration) 有效值範圍內的值會指派給這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text associated with this control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定這個控制項的相關文字。

trans-unit.source: The text associated with this control.
trans-unit.target: 與這個控制項關聯的文字。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets how text is aligned in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox" /> 控制項中文字的對齊方式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment" /> enumeration values that specifies how text is aligned in the control.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment" /> 列舉值，指出在控制項中文字的對齊方式。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="HorizontalAlignment.Left" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="HorizontalAlignment.Left" />。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to align the text within a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> to match the layout of text on your form.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個屬性來對齊文字方塊<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>以符合您的表單上的文字版面配置。

trans-unit.source: For example, if your controls are all located on the right side of the form, you can set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label.TextAlign%2A> property to `HorizontalAlignment.Right`, and the text will be aligned with the right side of the control instead of the default left alignment.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您的控制項都位於右側的表單，您可以設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label.TextAlign%2A>屬性`HorizontalAlignment.Right`，和的文字對齊右邊的控制項，而不是預設值靠左對齊。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control that is used to accept a password.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>用來接受密碼的控制項。

trans-unit.source: This example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.CharacterCasing%2A> property to change all characters typed to lowercase, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.MaxLength%2A> property to restrict the password length to eight characters.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.CharacterCasing%2A>屬性來變更類型的所有字元大小寫，而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.MaxLength%2A>屬性，以將密碼長度限制為 8 個字元。

trans-unit.source: This example also uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.TextAlign%2A> property to center the password in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 此範例也會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.TextAlign%2A>屬性中心中的密碼<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控制項。

trans-unit.source: A value that is not within the range of valid values for the enumeration was assigned to the property.
trans-unit.target: 不在列舉型別 (Enumeration) 有效值範圍內的值會指派給這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.TextAlign" /> property has changed.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.TextAlign" /> 屬性的值已變更時。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.TextAlignChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.TextAlignChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you find out when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表會幫助您找出事件發生，可協助您偵錯時。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> named `TextBox1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>名為`TextBox1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.TextAlignChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.TextAlignChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the text in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox" /> control should appear as the default password character.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox" /> 控制項中的文字是否應該顯示為預設密碼字元。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the text in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox" /> control should appear as the default password character; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox" /> 控制項中的文字應顯示為預設的密碼字元，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.UseSystemPasswordChar%2A> property has precedence over the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.PasswordChar%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.UseSystemPasswordChar%2A>屬性的優先順序高於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.PasswordChar%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Whenever the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.UseSystemPasswordChar%2A> is set to `true`, the default system password character is used and any character set by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.PasswordChar%2A> is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 每當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.UseSystemPasswordChar%2A>設`true`、 使用預設系統密碼字元，以及所設定的任何字元<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.PasswordChar%2A>會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> is in password mode because <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.PasswordChar%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.UseSystemPasswordChar%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A> is `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> is in restricted mode.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>是密碼模式中，因為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.PasswordChar%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.UseSystemPasswordChar%2A>，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A>是`true`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>為限制模式。

trans-unit.source: In this mode, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode> is disabled, but the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode> is cached so that it can be restored if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> ever becomes unrestricted.
trans-unit.target: 在此模式中，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode>已停用，但目前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode>快取，因此它可以還原如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>萬一不受限制。

trans-unit.source: Toggling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A> is a common scenario.
trans-unit.target: 切換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A>是常見的案例。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode> is shadowed while the control is in restricted mode.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode>控制項在受限制的模式時，會加上陰影。

trans-unit.source: From the designer perspective, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode> value shown is the actual value.
trans-unit.target: 從設計工具的觀點來看，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode>值顯示為實際值。

trans-unit.source: A Windows Message object.
trans-unit.target: Windows 訊息物件。

trans-unit.source: Processes Windows messages.
trans-unit.target: 處理 Windows 訊息。
